"More Katana Intensive Training!":
"Ah, you've come.
I figured you'd show up sooner or later.
Have you been getting better with the katana?
You have to do more intensive training!
I've prepared a new intensive training course.
It's a bit more difficult than the last one.
Don't hesitate, just give it a try!

*Limited to katanas"
"もっとカタナを特訓しちゃうよ！"

"おっ、来たね。
そろそろだと思ってたんだー。
カタナの腕、磨いてる？
もっとカタナ特訓しないとね！
新しい訓練用メニュー、用意したよ。
前のやつよりちょっと難しめのね。
ほらほら、迷ってないで、がんばってみ？

※抜剣系限定"
